column3: Ca' del Bosco 2015 Vintage Collection Satén (Franciacorta)

column1: Enticing aromas of iris, red berry and pine forest are front and center on this stunning red. Made with organically grown Sangiovese, the structured palate is surprisingly fresh for the hot vintage, offering succulent red cherry, raspberry jam, clove and cinnamon alongside fine-grained tannins and tangy acidity. Drink 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE
